verses.verse: רָאִ֨יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנָ֜י <WH136> the Lord נִצָּ֣ב <WH5324> standing עַֽל־ <WH5921> beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> upon the altar וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> and he said הַ֨ךְ <WH5221> Smite הַכַּפְתּ֜וֹר <WH3730> the lintel of the door וְיִרְעֲשׁ֣וּ <WH7493> may shake הַסִּפִּ֗ים <WH5592> that the posts וּבְצַ֙עַם֙ <WH1214> and cut בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> them in the head כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖ם <WH319> the last בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> of them with the sword אֶהֱרֹ֑ג <WH2026> all of them and I will slay לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have a יָנ֤וּס <WH5127> he that fleeth לָהֶם֙ נָ֔ס <WH5127> of them shall not flee away וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִמָּלֵ֥ט <WH4422> of them shall not be delivered לָהֶ֖ם פָּלִֽיט׃ <WH6412> and he that escapeth

אִם־ <WH518> Though יַחְתְּר֣וּ <WH2864> Though they dig בִשְׁא֔וֹל <WH7585> into hell מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יָדִ֣י <WH3027> thence shall mine hand תִקָּחֵ֑ם <WH3947> take וְאִֽם־ <WH518> and though יַעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> them though they climb up הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> to heaven מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אוֹרִידֵֽם׃ <WH3381> thence will I bring them down

וְאִם־ <WH518> Though יֵחָֽבְאוּ֙ <WH2244> And though they hide בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> themselves in the top הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3760> of Carmel מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there אֲחַפֵּ֖שׂ <WH2664> I will search וּלְקַחְתִּ֑ים <WH3947> and take them out וְאִם־ <WH518> and though יִסָּ֨תְר֜וּ <WH5641> thence and though they be hid מִנֶּ֤גֶד <WH5048> from עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> from my sight בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <WH7172> in the bottom הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> there אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> thence will I command אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> the serpent וּנְשָׁכָֽם׃ <WH5391> and he shall bite

וְאִם־ <WH518> and though יֵלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> go בַשְּׁבִי֙ <WH7628> into captivity לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹֽיבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> their enemies מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> there אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> thence will I command אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword וַהֲרָגָ֑תַם <WH2026> and it shall slay וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <WH7760> them and I will set עֵינִ֧י <WH5869> mine eyes עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> against לְרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> upon them for evil וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> for לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> and not for good

וַאדֹנָ֨י <WH136> And the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3069> GOD הַצְּבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַנּוֹגֵ֤עַ <WH5060> [is] he that toucheth בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the land וַתָּמ֔וֹג <WH4127> and it shall melt וְאָבְל֖וּ <WH56> therein shall mourn כָּל־ <WH3605> and all י֣וֹשְׁבֵי <WH3427> and all that dwell בָ֑הּ וְעָלְתָ֤ה <WH5927> and it shall rise up כַיְאֹר֙ <WH2975> wholly like a flood כֻּלָּ֔הּ <WH3605> and all וְשָׁקְעָ֖ה <WH8257> and shall be drowned כִּיאֹ֥ר <WH2975> as [by] the flood מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

הַבּוֹנֶ֤ה <WH1129> [It is] he that buildeth בַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> in the heaven [מַעֲלֹותֹו כ] (מַעֲלֹותָ֔יו <WH4609> step ק) וַאֲגֻדָּת֖וֹ <WH92> his troop עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the earth יְסָדָ֑הּ <WH3245> and hath founded הַקֹּרֵ֣א <WH7121> he that calleth לְמֵֽי־ <WH4325> for the waters הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> of the sea וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכֵ֛ם <WH8210> and poureth them out עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not כִבְנֵי֩ <WH1121> [Are] ye not as children כֻשִׁיִּ֨ים <WH3569> of the Ethiopians אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you לִ֛י בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto me O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> said יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <WH5927> Have not I brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּפְלִשְׁתִּיִּ֥ים <WH6430> and the Philistines מִכַּפְתּ֖וֹר <WH3731> from Caphtor וַאֲרָ֥ם <WH758> and the Syrians מִקִּֽיר׃ <WH7024> Kir

הִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> Behold עֵינֵ֣י ׀ <WH5869> Behold the eyes אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD בַּמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> kingdom הַֽחַטָּאָ֔ה <WH2400> the sinful וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֣י <WH8045> and I will destroy אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> it from off the face הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth אֶ֗פֶס <WH657> saving כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not הַשְׁמֵ֥יד <WH8045> that I will not utterly אַשְׁמִ֛יד <WH8045> destroy אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֔ה <WH6680> For lo I will command וַהֲנִע֥וֹתִי <WH5128> and I will sift בְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among all nations אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> as יִנּ֙וֹעַ֙ <WH5128> like as [corn] is sifted בַּכְּבָרָ֔ה <WH3531> in a sieve וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> fall צְר֖וֹר <WH6872> yet shall not the least grain אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יָמ֔וּתוּ <WH4191> shall die כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All חַטָּאֵ֣י <WH2400> All the sinners עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people הָאֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> which say לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תַגִּ֧ישׁ <WH5066> shall not overtake וְתַקְדִּ֛ים <WH6923> nor prevent בַּעֲדֵ֖ינוּ <WH5704> against הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> The evil

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> I אָקִ֛ים <WH6965> will I raise up אֶת־ <WH853> סֻכַּ֥ת <WH5521> the tabernacle דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David הַנֹּפֶ֑לֶת <WH5307> that is fallen וְגָדַרְתִּ֣י <WH1443> and close up אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְצֵיהֶ֗ן <WH6556> the breaches וַהֲרִֽסֹתָיו֙ <WH2034> his ruins אָקִ֔ים <WH6965> thereof and I will raise up וּבְנִיתִ֖יהָ <WH1129> and I will build כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> it as in the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of old

לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> because of יִֽירְשׁ֜וּ <WH3423> That they may possess אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <WH7611> the remnant אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> of Edom וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> and of all the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> which are called שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> by my name עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> that doeth זֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְנִגַּ֤שׁ <WH5066> shall overtake חוֹרֵשׁ֙ <WH2790> that the plowman בַּקֹּצֵ֔ר <WH7114> the reaper וְדֹרֵ֥ךְ <WH1869> and the treader עֲנָבִ֖ים <WH6025> of grapes בְּמֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> him that soweth הַזָּ֑רַע <WH2233> seed וְהִטִּ֤יפוּ <WH5197> shall drop הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> and the mountains עָסִ֔יס <WH6071> sweet wine וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> and all the hills תִּתְמוֹגַֽגְנָה׃ <WH4127> shall melt

וְשַׁבְתִּי֮ <WH7725> And I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> the captivity עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וּבָנ֞וּ <WH1129> and they shall build עָרִ֤ים <WH5892> cities נְשַׁמּוֹת֙ <WH8074> the waste וְיָשָׁ֔בוּ <WH3427> and inhabit וְנָטְע֣וּ <WH5193> [them] and they shall plant כְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> vineyards וְשָׁת֖וּ <WH8354> and drink אֶת־ <WH853> יֵינָ֑ם <WH3196> the wine וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> thereof they shall also make גַנּ֔וֹת <WH1593> gardens וְאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> and eat אֶת־ <WH853> פְּרִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6529> the fruit

וּנְטַעְתִּ֖ים <WH5193> And I will plant עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> them upon their land וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> not יִנָּתְשׁ֜וּ <WH5428> and they shall no more be pulled up ע֗וֹד <WH5750> again מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> out אַדְמָתָם֙ <WH127> out of their land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> them אָמַ֖ר <WH559> them saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God
